titleInfo.title: Letter from Lewis Pelly, Aboo [Ä€bu] to William Arden Crommelin

mods.abstract: Letter enclosing a memorandum from a coachman and requesting reports from the Superintendent Engineer on the state of the road:The memorandum details the difficulties with the road between Erinpoora [Erinpura] and Sanderao and beyond and the damage being caused to carriages by the difficulties.
